entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
